summary: Ape BEAR - A 0% tax token–$BEAR is for all of us who are looking for a massive come up. If you’re tired of the streets, if you’ve had enough digging through piles of shit to find gold, then it’s time to ride with your fellow BEARs. The bear is sick and tired of scraping the bottom. He’s coming out of crypto hibernation. If you want to end the homeless bear epidemic, buy $BEAR.
